After install, go to Services and disable Volume Shadow Copy service to avoid Growing disk space.

Printer Setting
* For printer users: 
* Open Services on> 
* Search the Print Spooler, 
* move the Startup type to Automatic, start it, 
* then connect to the printer manually and then install the driver is complete. 

3g Data Card Setting
* For 3G users: after installing the driver is finished, 
* before the 3G internet connection for the first time, 
* go to Services> Secure Socket Tunneling Protocol to find the> 
* Right-click Start> 
* 3G internet connection then normal. 
* The next time not to do so anymore.
